data.title: A Side Attacker Default Wall to A Heaven
data.description: Here's a powerful wall you can throw at the start of the round to pressure any Defenders that are playing towards A. Essentially, this enforces Defenders to worry about A Heaven.

data.title: A Site Toxic Screen + Poison Orb Execute Setup
data.description: This Toxic Screen + Poison Orb combo blocks sightlines of Defenders through A Tower and A Screens, which are crucial sightlines to block during most of the common A Site Executes, alongside blocking vision of Defenders into A Main from A Ramps.
